channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WY

item.title: Report E-2024090504
item.description:
Report E-2024090504

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-25T09:22:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-11
  • City: WAMSUTTER
  • State: WY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On September 11, 2024, one (1) 5-gallon pail of UN1139 was damaged in transit due to unknown reasons and released approximately one (1) gallon of product to the trailer interior and gravel beneath. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Environmental Restoration (ER) to remediate the impacted site. personnel deployed oil dry to the impacted area and worked it in with hand tools, a berm was put in place to prevent further migration of any material, during the duration of the continued to transport. All absorbents were collected and containerized into one (1) 55-gallon drum. On September 12, 2024, additional granular absorbents were deployed and they worked them in with hand tools. All remaining product was collected and containerized into one (1) additional 55-gallon drum.
